dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset used for training and evaluating Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF), which enables the generation of photorealistic novel views of 3D scenes from a collection of 2D images.
dcterms:title: NeRF synthetic dataset

dcterms:creator: Arno Knapitsch

dcterms:description: A dataset for benchmarking large-scale scene reconstruction, providing a variety of complex 3D scenes for evaluation.
dcterms:title: Tanks and Temples dataset
